function ResultCard({ result }) { return (

{result.sentiment_label?.toUpperCase()}

{result.summary}

Polaridad
{result.polarity}
Subjetividad
{result.subjectivity}
Fecha
{result.created_at ? new Date(result.created_at).toLocaleString() : 'N/D'}
); } export default ResultCard;
